title: Family matters
creator_credit: Robert Van der Vvyer and Jenny Drew
brief_description: The twelve months after the first baby arrives can be a crucial time in a couple’s relationship. The twosome becomes a threesome, and much of a couple’s time and energy is directed towards caregiving, with possible misunderstandings and resentments occurring if each partner does not understand how the other is feeling.
